nodeList.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. A {Blood Orb} is drawn back to you which restores 10 health when it reaches you.
nodeList.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted
nodeList.nodeDescription: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 10 health when it reaches you

nodeList.description: {Blood Splatter} deals damage in a larger area.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Blood splatter has [25%] increased area per point

node.altText:
Nodes on this tree do not apply to {Blood Splatter} unless stated otherwise.

Hitting or killing an enemy with {Blood Splatter} does not count as hitting or killing an enemy with Rip Blood.

If you have more than 100% chance to cause {Blood Splatter} you can cause multiple {Blood Splatters}.
node.description: Rip Blood hits have a chance to create a {Blood Splatter} at the target, dealing damage to other enemies around it, but not the original target.
node.nodeDescription: +[20%] chance per point to cause blood splatter to splatter out and hit nearby enemies, but not the target.

node.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. A {Blood Orb} is drawn back to you which restores 10 health when it reaches you.
node.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted
node.nodeDescription: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 10 health when it reaches you

node.altText:
Nodes on this tree do not apply to {Blood Splatter} unless stated otherwise.

Hitting or killing an enemy with {Blood Splatter} does not count as hitting or killing an enemy with Rip Blood.

If you have more than 100% chance to cause {Blood Splatter} you can cause multiple {Blood Splatters}. The second {Blood Splatter} can hit the original target and targets hit by the first splatter.
node.description:
Rip Blood has a significantly higher chance to make a {Blood Splatter}, but costs more mana.

This {Blood Splatter} can not occur if you are out of mana.
node.nodeDescription: Adds 6 to mana cost. +100% chance to cause blood splatter to splatter out and hit nearby enemies, but not the target.

node.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted

nodeList.altText: This ward gain is not affected by healing effectiveness.
nodeList.description:
{Blood Orbs} now grant ward instead of health, equal to half of the health they would have restored.

Being at or close to full health does not affect the amount of the ward the {Blood Orbs} grant.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The orb of blood created by rip blood no longer restores health, but instead grants ward equal to half the health it would have restored.\n\nBeing at or close to full health does not affect the amount of the ward the orb grants.

node.description: Rip Blood's and {Blood Splatter's} base physical damage is converted to necrotic damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to necrotic damage, but not increases to physical damage.
node.nodeDescription: The base physical damage dealt by Rip Blood and {Blood Splatter} is converted to necrotic damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to necrotic damage, but not increases to physical damage.

nodeList.altText:
Nodes on this tree do not apply to {Blood Splatter} unless stated otherwise.

Hitting or killing an enemy with {Blood Splatter} does not count as hitting or killing an enemy with Rip Blood.

If you have more than 100% chance to cause {Blood Splatter} you can cause multiple {Blood Splatters}. The second {Blood Splatter} can hit the original target and targets hit by the first splatter.
nodeList.description:
Rip Blood has a significantly higher chance to make a {Blood Splatter}, but costs more mana.

This {Blood Splatter} can not occur if you are out of mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Adds 6 to mana cost. +100% chance to cause blood splatter to splatter out and hit nearby enemies, but not the target.

node.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. A {Blood Orb} is drawn back to you which restores 10 health when it reaches you.
node.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted
node.nodeDescription: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 10 health when it reaches you

node.description: {Blood Splatter} deals damage in a larger area.
node.nodeDescription: Blood splatter has [25%] increased area per point

node.altText:
Nodes on this tree do not apply to {Blood Splatter} unless stated otherwise.

Hitting or killing an enemy with {Blood Splatter} does not count as hitting or killing an enemy with Rip Blood.

If you have more than 100% chance to cause {Blood Splatter} you can cause multiple {Blood Splatters}.
node.description: Rip Blood hits have a chance to create a {Blood Splatter} at the target, dealing damage to other enemies around it, but not the original target.
node.nodeDescription: +[20%] chance per point to cause blood splatter to splatter out and hit nearby enemies, but not the target.

node.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. A {Blood Orb} is drawn back to you which restores 10 health when it reaches you.
node.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted
node.nodeDescription: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 10 health when it reaches you

nodeList.description: Rip Blood can be cast on your minions, but no longer can be cast on enemies. {Blood Orbs} restore significantly more health.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Rip blood targets and damages your minions instead of enemies. The health restored by the orb of blood created by rip blood is increased by 100%.\n\nBlood splatter still functions as normal.

node.description: {Blood Orbs} grant additional health and the {Blood Orb} returns faster.
node.nodeDescription: The orb of blood created by rip blood restores [4] additional health per point and returns to you [20%] faster per point.

node.description: Rip Blood has increased cast speed.
node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased cast speed per point

node.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. A {Blood Orb} is drawn back to you which restores 10 health when it reaches you.
node.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted
node.nodeDescription: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 10 health when it reaches you

nodeList.description:
Rip Blood will automatically cast itself on a nearby enemy if it kills an enemy, but no longer creates {Blood Orbs}.

This effect can repeat and chain to other enemies. This effect cannot trigger if you are out of mana.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Rip Blood no longer creates an orb of blood, and so can no longer return health, ward, or mana. If Rip Blood kills its target it is cast again for free at a new target near the dead one. This new cast can itself trigger an additional cast if it kills its target. This effect cannot trigger while you are out of mana.

node.description: Rip Blood deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
node.nodeDescription: Rip Blood deals [15%] increased damage per point

node.description: Rip Blood hits grant you increased spell damage for 4 seconds. This effect can stack.
node.nodeDescription: You gain [5%] increased spell damage per point for 4 seconds when you hit an enemy with rip blood

node.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. A {Blood Orb} is drawn back to you which restores 10 health when it reaches you.
node.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted
node.nodeDescription: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 10 health when it reaches you

nodeList.description: Rip Blood's and {Blood Splatter's} base physical damage is converted to necrotic damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to necrotic damage, but not increases to physical damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The base physical damage dealt by Rip Blood and {Blood Splatter} is converted to necrotic damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to necrotic damage, but not increases to physical damage.

node.description: Rip Blood hits grant you increased spell damage for 4 seconds. This effect can stack.
node.nodeDescription: You gain [5%] increased spell damage per point for 4 seconds when you hit an enemy with rip blood

node.description: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. A {Blood Orb} is drawn back to you which restores 10 health when it reaches you.
node.loreText: The life blood of your foes need not be wasted
node.nodeDescription: Rips blood out of a target enemy dealing physical damage to it. An orb of the blood is drawn back to you, restoring 10 health when it reaches you

nodeList.description: Rip Blood leaves a stench on the target enemy that causes your minions to prioritise attacking it.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Rip blood leaves a stench on the target enemy that causes your minions to prioritise attacking it

node.nodeDescription: [6%] increased cast speed per point
